nodes.text: This B1 battle droid served in the Clone Wars, but afterwards went rogue, and the B1-series battle droid would become a bounty hunter. The battle droid wore a cape and used a vibroblade attached to its arm which had the word "armblade" written in Aurebesh.
The Rogue B1 Battle Droid card first appeared in the Desperate Circumstances set, for Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars: The Card Game which was released in November 9, 2017.[source?]

While the title of the card states that the droid featured is a B1 battle droid, the droid itself possess a different looking neck, arms, and body from other B1s. The head of the droid also looks very close to the head of a BX-series droid commando. Nevertheless, this article reflects what the source says and assumes it is a B1 battle droid.
